caseTitle: Province of the Punjab thr. Deputy Commissioner/District Collector, Rawalpindi & another v. Muhammad Akram & others
tagline: Powers of declaratory judgments under Article 184 of the Constitution in the dispute between any two or more Governments. The object of Order 1 Rule 10 C.P.C is to enable the Court effectually and completely to adjudicate upon and settle all the questions involved between the necessary and proper parties.
